citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany an APHIS Official during the inspection process at 2:35 pm to 3 pm
on December 1, 2021. During that time, the inspector waited at the facility, knocked on door, and called the phone
number on file leaving a message.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany an APHIS Official during the inspection process at 2:35 pm to 3 pm 
on December 1, 2021. During that time, the inspector waited at the facility, knocked on door, and called the phone 
number on file leaving a message. 
 
 
 
End Section
